title: Can we stop complaining about Lux?
body:
Seriously I'm getting a bit fed up hearing everyone complain that Lux got an ultimate skin. 
We all have our champs and this time they decided to make one for Lux, big deal get over it. I'm sorry but yes there are plenty of champs out there
that you think should get pretty ultimate skins but at the end of the day can't we even consider how much work and effort went into making this skin?
I met someone who worked on the DJ Sona skin and she said it took 2 years! so how about stop complaining when these people
worked their asses off to make this skin for us. 

I play lux and I'm happy they made her a new skin, yes they just did the star guardian thing but guys that's not even a new skin for lux, only an update and a bunch of new skins for OTHER CHAMPIONS! it wasn't JUST ABOUT LUX

one more thing, why am I suddenly being complained at for playing Lux as a support now?
she is a support!

Stuns, slows, shields, CC and I don't know if you all have realized this but .... NOT EVERY SUPPORT HEALS YOU.
I'm just saying there's no Issue with playing Lux as a support and sorry if you have had bad Lux player's but
as a Support main and lvl 6 Lux who get's a lot of good feedback from their team during game. Deal with it.

replies.body: It taken 2 years to make the DJ Sona skin, are you implying that the skin designers in Riot are incompetent? lmfao

2 years from initial decisions (champion, basic themes) through concepting, solidification, art compositions, music choice and composition, rights acquisitions, asset (anims, textures, SFX, VFX etc) designing, asset testing, asset finalising, teasing, other media (cinematic music video) designing and completing, testing and then finally release?

Sounds reasonable to me for a project of this scale.

The decisions and concepting takes A LOT longer for an ultimate skin because there's so much more that goes into it and they want it to be absolutely perfect. PF Ez was more ambitious than anything they'd ever done. So was SG Udyr, and DJ Sona, and now Elementalist Lux. There's a whole lot of new stuff going into these skins AND they have to make it all fit within League's world and art style.

You seem to think art, especially art on this scale with this much collaboration is easy, and that just ain't so.

You do realize how much went into it right?

I think the reason people don't really like support Lux is two fold. Firstly there are supports that do similar things just better. Take Morgana for example, she has better cc, a much better shield and still does damage. Where as Luxs abilities are more about blowing up targets. 

Now don't get me wrong you can still play her as support. But then again you can support with almost anyone which leads me to the second reason. 

There are people who take lux into the support role but don't actually support with her. Sure they buy the support item first but after that it's just straight damage. They basically just play mid lane Lux out of the bot lane. This problem isn't just found with Lux but it's definitely there and it's probably being exacerbated by people wanting to use her new skin. When they don't get mid they take her supp even if they have no intention of supporting.
I know, still there are some of us who support her really well and actually support
except for those full ap lux support with full ks cs steal and no support item
im not complaining she got a skin, im complaining people only play her because of the skin
